spec_data.Name: ghc-connection
spec_data.Description:
Simple network library for all your connection need.

Features: Really simple to use, SSL/TLS, SOCKS.

This library provides a very simple api to create sockets to a destination with
the choice of SSL/TLS, and SOCKS.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 04 Oct 2017 05:20:55 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple and easy network connections API
